item.title: SCJ Biologi BPK Penabur - MCB Tutorial I
item.description: Molecular Biology - Isoelectric Point of Proteins Q1 The following sequence of template DNA encodes a protein called Pz.Kpfw.VI: 5’-GGTGTCTACATACCACATGGTAGTCTTGGTGCCCCATGCGTCAGAGTGAATCGCCCGTAAATATTTGGTGTGTACCAGCTAACAACTGTACAGGTGT-3’ Q1.A Using the table in Appendix A, identify the polypeptide sequence synthesized! Write your answer from N- to -C and use 3 letters notation (e.g N– GLY ALA VAL –C) Q1.B Determine the point of isoelectric of Pz.Kpfw.VI! Use Appendix B. Q1.C Trypsin (N-Lys/Arg-C*) is added to the solution containing Pz.
